snippet.title: Ticket To Ride (Digital Game) - English Trailer
snippet.description:
The official adaptation of Days of Wonder's best-selling train board game, Ticket to Ride, now on mobile version! In addition to the exciting multiplayer mode, players will enjoy a new intuitive user interface, new social media capabilities to share exciting moments, and play against live opponents from all around the world on the various boards! With over 50 million games played online and a new game starting every 4 seconds on average, Ticket to Ride offers a game experience unique amongst its peers.

More infos on https://www.daysofwonder.com/online/en/t2r
Download Ticket to Ride on Android, iOS and Steam:
• Android: https://goo.gl/eIsus0
• iOS: http://apple.co/1PjrHPk
• Amazon: https://amzn.to/2c9TELC
• Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/108200/?l=english

Follow us on social medias!
• Facebook Ticket to Ride : https://www.facebook.com/ttrdigital
• Facebook Asmodee Digital : https://www.facebook.com/AsmodeeDigital
• Twitter : https://www.twitter.com/AsmodeeDigital
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/asmodeedigital
